title: I have trouble getting into the game
body: I login with my credentials but it just stays on authenticating. This is on live and on pbe. Also my hearthstone is stuck on the pulsating icon after I have hit play on the battle.net(I know this doesn't pertain to league) Can anyone help me? Im really frustrated. I have tired to hextech repair tool and it didnt fix anything.

replies.body: Sounds like you might have a firewall setting or block that's preventing you from reaching authentication servers, and I'm assuming that may be the same deal with your other games.  See if auto-configuring your firewall settings helps via the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Double check anti-virus settings as well and go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  That should help get this fixed up!

Hm, weird.  If your firewall settings are adjusted properly, there must be some setting elsewhere causing this block.  Grab the logs from the HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case.  Our tech team can take a look with you directly and help pinpoint the cause.
I try sending a ticket but when im logged in it still asks me to login once i select the criteria
Hey there, you'll need to login to the ticketing center to submit a ticket.  If this is an issue, you can also send us an email along with your attachments via support@riotgames.com.

Can you guys get on it as soon as i send it? Ive been frustrated not being able to play at all. I havent ever touched my firewall settings or anything like that. I always just go on youtube and league, etc.
We don't expedite tickets, but our tech volume isn't super high right now.  A tech member will reach out as soon as they can!
Okay, thanks for being active on help and support. I really appreciate the fast responses.
